Hi

I’m Marcos. I used to like drawing, and I used to write a lot. Nowadays I prefer reading. I live with my wife in Germany. I work as a programmer (and I like it).

I’m a big fan of starting new things and rarely finishing them. The good thing is: I get to learn some (useless?) stuff. The not so good thing is: I don’t get to brag about it. Anyway, in an alternate universe I’m sure I’ve worked on something that revolutionized the IT world. Meanwhile, in this universe, you can check what I’m doing right now, read some more structured stuff, or find out more about me and this site.

lessmarcos.com is a place where I archive my stuff raw & unedited, so if it’s prose you may find grammar mistakes; if it’s code you’ll definitely find bugs!
